questions.question: How long does implementation really take?
questions.answer: Core systems are operational within 30 days. Full optimization and team proficiency typically achieved by day 90. Unlike software vendors who disappear after setup, we stay engaged until you achieve guaranteed results.

questions.question: What's required from our team during implementation?
questions.answer: Approximately 2-4 hours per week from key personnel (owner, project manager, office manager). We handle technical setup, integration, and training. Your team focuses on learning optimized processes, not technical implementation.

questions.question: Can we continue normal operations during implementation?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Implementation happens alongside ongoing projects with minimal disruption. We typically start with new projects and gradually migrate existing ones to avoid any client impact.

questions.question: What if we're already using specific software (Procore, BuilderTrend, etc.)?
questions.answer: We integrate with your existing systems rather than replacing them. Our optimization approach improves how you use current tools and fills gaps with complementary solutions.

questions.question: Do we need IT staff or technical expertise?
questions.answer: No technical expertise required. We handle all setup, integration, and maintenance. Your team learns optimized processes, not technical systems management.

questions.question: What happens if technology breaks or needs updates?
questions.answer: All technical support, updates, and maintenance included in ongoing service. We proactively monitor systems and resolve issues before they impact operations.

questions.question: How do you guarantee results?
questions.answer: We measure specific KPIs during 30-day baseline period, then validate 15-25% improvements by day 90. If targets aren't met, you receive full refund minus any measurable gains already achieved.

questions.question: What metrics do you track for the guarantee?
questions.answer: Primary metrics include: project completion time, change order processing speed, client response time, quality control cycle time, and overall profit margin per project. Specific KPIs customized to your business model.

questions.question: What if our business is seasonal?
questions.answer: Guarantee timeline adjusted for seasonal patterns. We baseline performance during active periods and measure improvements during comparable future periods to ensure fair assessment.

questions.question: Can we finance the investment?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer 12-24 month payment plans for qualified clients. Many builders use efficiency gains from early months to fund remaining payments.

questions.question: How quickly do we see ROI?
questions.answer: Most clients achieve positive cash flow within 60-90 days. Full ROI (10:1 minimum) typically realized within 6-12 months, depending on project volume and efficiency baseline.

questions.question: Are there ongoing costs after implementation?
questions.answer: Monthly optimization and support fee of $3K-$5K (depending on business size) covers system maintenance, performance monitoring, and continuous improvement. This investment typically pays for itself through ongoing efficiency gains.

questions.question: What does territory exclusivity mean?
questions.answer: We work with only one luxury builder per geographic market (typically county or metropolitan area). This ensures you maintain competitive advantage and prevents us from working with direct competitors.

questions.question: How do you define our exclusive territory?
questions.answer: Territory defined by your primary service area and competitive landscape. Typically covers 25-50 mile radius from your office, adjusted for market density and competition patterns.

questions.question: What happens after the 90-day implementation?
questions.answer: Ongoing partnership includes monthly performance reviews, quarterly optimization sessions, system updates, and continuous process improvements. We're invested in your long-term success, not just initial implementation.

questions.question: Can we cancel if we're not satisfied?
questions.answer: 30-day notice for ongoing services after initial 90-day guarantee period. However, 95% of clients continue long-term due to sustained benefits and ongoing optimization opportunities.
